SEARCH
Package com.app.converter

Interface FromQuestWithAnswerToQuestData

All Superinterfaces:
Converter<QuestWithAnswer,QuestData>
All Known Implementing Classes:
FromQuestWithAnswerToQuestDataImpl
public interface FromQuestWithAnswerToQuestData extends Converter<QuestWithAnswer,QuestData>
Interface for converting a list of QuestWithAnswer objects into QuestData objects. This interface extends the Converter interface, specifying the source and target types.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <T> Map<T,List<QuestData>>
    toGroupBy(List<QuestWithAnswer> playerWithStatistics, Function<Quest,T> mapper)
    Groups a list of QuestWithAnswer entities by keys (defined by the provided mapper) and returns a map where each key corresponds to a list of QuestData.
    List<QuestData>
    toList(List<QuestWithAnswer> entityType)
    Converts a list of QuestWithAnswer entities into a list of QuestData.
    <T> Map<T,QuestData>
    toMap(List<QuestWithAnswer> playerWithStatistics, Function<Quest,T> mapper)
    Converts a list of QuestWithAnswer entities into a map where the keys are generated using the provided mapper function and the values are the corresponding QuestData objects.

  • Method Details

    • toList

      List<QuestData> toList(List<QuestWithAnswer> entityType)
      Converts a list of QuestWithAnswer entities into a list of QuestData.
      Specified by:
      toList in interface Converter<QuestWithAnswer,QuestData>
      Parameters:
      entityType - List of QuestWithAnswer entities to convert.
      Returns:
      List of QuestData containing quest details and associated answers.

    • toMap

      <T> Map<T,QuestData> toMap(List<QuestWithAnswer> playerWithStatistics, Function<Quest,T> mapper)
      Converts a list of QuestWithAnswer entities into a map where the keys are generated using the provided mapper function and the values are the corresponding QuestData objects.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the key in the resulting map.
      Parameters:
      playerWithStatistics - List of QuestWithAnswer entities to convert.
      mapper - Function that maps a Quest to a key of type T.
      Returns:
      A map where the keys are generated using the mapper function and values are the corresponding QuestData objects.

    • toGroupBy

      <T> Map<T,List<QuestData>> toGroupBy(List<QuestWithAnswer> playerWithStatistics, Function<Quest,T> mapper)
      Groups a list of QuestWithAnswer entities by keys (defined by the provided mapper) and returns a map where each key corresponds to a list of QuestData.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the key in the resulting map.
      Parameters:
      playerWithStatistics - List of QuestWithAnswer entities to convert.
      mapper - Function that maps a Quest to a key of type T.
      Returns:
      A map where the keys are generated using the mapper function and values are lists of corresponding QuestData objects.
